response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am confident it will significantly enhance your life or business in ways that are yet to be discovered. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my desire to ensure that such a valuable asset finds its way into the hands of someone who appreciates its true worth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 950000}
